rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer that welcomes guests, incorporating traditional Kerala motifs and natural light. The hall is designed to lead directly into the main living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open area for family gatherings and relaxation. It features traditional Kerala woodwork, large windows facing south-east to harness sunlight in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A space dedicated for dining and casual meals. It is positioned near the kitchen to facilitate efficient service.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.description: A formal dining space, traditionally used for hosting guests and family events. Incorporates Kerala-style decorative elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space designed with traditional Kerala layout and sufficient storage. Features ample natural light from windows facing south to enhance energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with traditional Kerala design elements. It is positioned to benefit from the natural light and has easy access from the entrance hall.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact utility space for laundry and storage. Designed to be functional yet in keeping with the aesthetic of a Kerala-style bungalow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-equipped bathroom with natural lighting and ventilation. Traditional Kerala style tiles and fixtures enhance its aesthetics.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: North-facing entrance that opens into the Entrance Hall. Designed to enhance positive energy as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window Panels
openings.description: Multiple large windows installed along the living areas and kitchen to maximize natural light and ventilation. Windows placed in alignment with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: French Doors
openings.description: Connecting indoor spaces to a small patio or garden area, ensuring a seamless transition between interior and exterior while observing privacy norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed for the primary occupants. It features a walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom and traditional Kerala decor elements.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation. Decorated in Kerala style with modern amenities.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: An additional bedroom to complete the 4BHK requirement. Maintains traditional Kerala design aesthetics with practical modern touches.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A study area designed for work or study with proper lighting and ventilation. Incorporates traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: An ensuite bathroom providing privacy and comfort. Features modern fixtures along with traditional Kerala style touches.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A bathroom for guests ensuring adequate space and facilities. Designed following traditional Kerala style with modern amenities.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Balconies adjacent to the bedrooms providing outdoor space and fresh air. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A wide and secure staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor. Designed with traditional Kerala woodwork for aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: Servant's Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom for the servant. Designed to be modest yet functional, adhering to local norms and privacy requirements.

rooms.name: Servant's Bathroom
rooms.description: A small bathroom attached to the servant's bedroom ensuring convenience and privacy.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact kitchen area for the servant. Includes essential cooking amenities and storage, designed to blend with traditional Kerala aesthetics.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A separate entrance for servant quarters ensuring privacy and easy access. Located at the rear of the property.

additional_info.vastu_alignment: North-facing entrance and strategic room placements to optimize energy flow according to Vastu principles.
additional_info.notes: Local building norms have been considered in the design. Detailed construction drawings and permits should be handled by a certified professional.
